pr_title: Utilize existing StandardCharsets.UTF-8 instead of hardcoded values or home-made constants

timeline.message: Replace redundant StringUtil.UTF8_CHARSET constant with StandardCharsets.UTF_8
Replace redundant Bits.UTF8_CHARSET constant with StandardCharsets.UTF_8

timeline.bodyText: The nerdy pun needs to go away since the constructor accepting Charset object doesn't throw an exception.
timeline.author: pivovarit
